content.title: Getting Here
content.description:
**[Fly to Reno-Tahoe International Airport - RNO](https://www.renoairport.com/)**

Service to Reno, Nevada is offered by major US airlines. Non-stop flights are available from New York, Los Angeles, Long Beach, San Francisco, San Jose, and Seattle. Squaw Valley is approximately a [one-hour drive from Reno Airport](https://www.google.com/maps/dir/Reno-Tahoe+International+Airport,+East+Plumb+Lane,+Reno,+NV/Squaw+Valley+Resort,+Squaw+Valley+Road,+Olympic+Valley,+CA/@39.3506966,-120.1313206,11z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m14!4m13!1m5!1m1!1s0x80993f70adbc4917:0x10401eff20af5940!2m2!1d-119.7680951!2d39.4995907!1m5!1m1!1s0x809bd9ecf08f263d:0x30be88f09785170f!2m2!1d-120.2354422!2d39.197607!3e0).

**[Fly to San Francisco International Airport - SFO](https://www.flysfo.com/)**

San Francisco is the closest major international airport to Squaw Valley, direct flights are offered to San Francisco from many cities within the US, Europe, and Asia.  Squaw Valley is approximately a [four-hour drive from San Francisco](https://www.google.com/maps/dir/SFO,+San+Francisco,+CA/Squaw+Valley+Resort,+Squaw+Valley+Road,+Olympic+Valley,+CA/@38.446707,-121.8635067,9z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m14!4m13!1m5!1m1!1s0x808f778c55555555:0xa4f25c571acded3f!2m2!1d-122.3789554!2d37.6213129!1m5!1m1!1s0x809bd9ecf08f263d:0x30be88f09785170f!2m2!1d-120.2354422!2d39.197607!3e0), it's mostly highway driving with the last hour through mountains. Historically, the best time to avoid heavy traffic is leaving Friday before noon, or after the evening commuter rush.

**[Fly to Sacramento International Airport (SMF)](https://sacramento.aero/smf)**

Service to Sacramento, California is offered by major US airlines. Squaw Valley is approximately a [two-hour drive from Sacramento](https://www.google.com/maps/dir/Sacramento+International+Airport,+6900+Airport+Blvd,+Sacramento,+CA+95837/Squaw+Valley+Resort,+Squaw+Valley+Road,+Olympic+Valley,+CA/@38.9452782,-121.3556728,9z/data=!4m14!4m13!1m5!1m1!1s0x809b2b73ce6a70ad:0xa460901228ef4232!2m2!1d-121.5900648!2d38.6950854!1m5!1m1!1s0x809bd9ecf08f263d:0x30be88f09785170f!2m2!1d-120.2354422!2d39.197607!3e0).

content.title: 湖等
content.description:
**[Fly to Reno-Tahoe International Airport - RNO](https://www.renoairport.com/)**

Service to Reno, Nevada is offered by major US airlines. Non-stop flights are available from New York, Los Angeles, Long Beach, San Francisco, San Jose, and Seattle. Squaw Valley is approximately a [one-hour drive from Reno Airport](https://www.google.com/maps/dir/Reno-Tahoe+International+Airport,+East+Plumb+Lane,+Reno,+NV/Squaw+Valley+Resort,+Squaw+Valley+Road,+Olympic+Valley,+CA/@39.3506966,-120.1313206,11z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m14!4m13!1m5!1m1!1s0x80993f70adbc4917:0x10401eff20af5940!2m2!1d-119.7680951!2d39.4995907!1m5!1m1!1s0x809bd9ecf08f263d:0x30be88f09785170f!2m2!1d-120.2354422!2d39.197607!3e0).

**[Fly to San Francisco International Airport - SFO](https://www.flysfo.com/)**

San Francisco is the closest major international airport to Squaw Valley, direct flights are offered to San Francisco from many cities within the US, Europe, and Asia.  Squaw Valley is approximately a [four-hour drive from San Francisco](https://www.google.com/maps/dir/SFO,+San+Francisco,+CA/Squaw+Valley+Resort,+Squaw+Valley+Road,+Olympic+Valley,+CA/@38.446707,-121.8635067,9z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m14!4m13!1m5!1m1!1s0x808f778c55555555:0xa4f25c571acded3f!2m2!1d-122.3789554!2d37.6213129!1m5!1m1!1s0x809bd9ecf08f263d:0x30be88f09785170f!2m2!1d-120.2354422!2d39.197607!3e0), it's mostly highway driving with the last hour through mountains. Historically, the best time to avoid heavy traffic is leaving Friday before noon, or after the evening commuter rush.

**[Fly to Sacramento International Airport (SMF)](https://sacramento.aero/smf)**

Service to Sacramento, California is offered by major US airlines. Squaw Valley is approximately a [two-hour drive from Sacramento](https://www.google.com/maps/dir/Sacramento+International+Airport,+6900+Airport+Blvd,+Sacramento,+CA+95837/Squaw+Valley+Resort,+Squaw+Valley+Road,+Olympic+Valley,+CA/@38.9452782,-121.3556728,9z/data=!4m14!4m13!1m5!1m1!1s0x809b2b73ce6a70ad:0xa460901228ef4232!2m2!1d-121.5900648!2d38.6950854!1m5!1m1!1s0x809bd9ecf08f263d:0x30be88f09785170f!2m2!1d-120.2354422!2d39.197607!3e0).

**[Na lotnisko Reno-Tahoe - RNO](https://www.renoairport.com/)**

Usługi do Reno w stanie Nevada są oferowane przez główne amerykańskie linie lotnicze. Loty bez przesiadek są dostępne z Nowego Jorku, Los Angeles, Long Beach, San Francisco, San Jose i Seattle. Squaw Valley to w przybliżeniu
[jednej godziny jazdy z lotniska Reno](https://www.google.com/maps/dir/Reno-Tahoe+International+Airport,+East+Plumb+Lane,+Reno,+NV/Squaw+Valley+Resort,+Squaw+Valley+Road,+Olympic+Valley,+CA/@39.3506966,-120.1313206,11z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m14!4m13!1m5!1m1!1s0x80993f70adbc4917:0x10401eff20af5940!2m2!1d-119.7680951!2d39.4995907!1m5!1m1!1s0x809bd9ecf08f263d:0x30be88f09785170f!2m2!1d-120.2354422!2d39.197607!3e0).

**[Na lotnisko do San Francisco - SFO](https://www.flysfo.com/)**

San Francisco jest największym międzynarodowym lotniskiem położonym najbliżej Squaw Valley, do San Francisco oferowane są bezpośrednie loty z wielu miast w Stanach Zjednoczonych, Europie i Azji. Squaw Valley to w przybliżeniu [cztery godziny jazdy od San Francisco](https://www.google.com/maps/dir/SFO,+San+Francisco,+CA/Squaw+Valley+Resort,+Squaw+Valley+Road,+Olympic+Valley,+CA/@38.446707,-121.8635067,9z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m14!4m13!1m5!1m1!1s0x808f778c55555555:0xa4f25c571acded3f!2m2!1d-122.3789554!2d37.6213129!1m5!1m1!1s0x809bd9ecf08f263d:0x30be88f09785170f!2m2!1d-120.2354422!2d39.197607!3e0), to głównie jazda autostradą z ostatnią godziną przez góry. Historycznie najlepszym momentem na uniknięcie dużego natężenia ruchu jest wyjazd w piątek przed południem lub po wieczornym pośpiechu.


**[Na lotnisko do Sacramento (SMF)](https://sacramento.aero/smf)**

Serwis do Sacramento w Kalifornii jest oferowany przez główne amerykańskie linie lotnicze. Squaw Valley to w przybliżeniu
 [dwie godziny jazdy od Sacramento](https://www.google.com/maps/dir/Sacramento+International+Airport,+6900+Airport+Blvd,+Sacramento,+CA+95837/Squaw+Valley+Resort,+Squaw+Valley+Road,+Olympic+Valley,+CA/@38.9452782,-121.3556728,9z/data=!4m14!4m13!1m5!1m1!1s0x809b2b73ce6a70ad:0xa460901228ef4232!2m2!1d-121.5900648!2d38.6950854!1m5!1m1!1s0x809bd9ecf08f263d:0x30be88f09785170f!2m2!1d-120.2354422!2d39.197607!3e0).
content.title: Przylot

descriptions.description:
For your convenience, a block of 20 hotel suites has the **[Village at Squaw Valley](https://www.google.com/maps/dir//1960+Squaw+Valley+Rd,+Olympic+Valley,+CA+96146/@39.1969388,-120.2391109,16z/data=!4m9!4m8!1m0!1m5!1m1!1s0x809bd9ec83b579d1:0xa30a54820d8f18de!2m2!1d-120.2346848!2d39.197327!3e)**. To receive a discounted rate use this [room block reservation link](https://book.squawalpine.com/Ecomm/Package/Package/9801138/en-US/?packageid=56589&promocode=CheMarzejon), or call the Resort’s Reservations Department at [866-818-6963](tel:866-818-6963) and mention the Che/Marzejon wedding. The hotel block is available for reservations until Aug 4, 2021.

Squaw Valley has a limited hotel and vacation rentals (e.g., Airbnb and VRBO) available. Lodging in Squaw Valley also include:

* [Resort at Squaw Creek](https://www.destinationhotels.​com/squawcreek?src=agn\_sabre\_​prop_seo_rnodh_gmb)
* [Red Wolf Lodge at Squaw](https://www.redwolfsquaw.com/)
* [PlumpJack Squaw Valley Inn](https://​plumpjacksquawvalleyinn.com/)

Alternatives to Squaw Valley in Tahoe include:

* Tahoe City, the nearest city and located on Lake Tahoe (travel to Squaw Valley ~12 min by car)
* Kings Beach is also located on Lake Tahoe (travel to Squaw Valley ~30 min by car)
* Truckee (travel to Squaw Valley ~18 min by car)
* Donner Lake Village (travel to Squaw Valley ~30 min by car)

Dla Twojej wygody blok 20 apartamentów hotelowych ma ** [Village at Squaw Valley] (https://www.google.com/maps/dir//1960+Squaw+Valley+Rd,+Olympic+Valley,+ CA + 96146 / @ 39.1969388, -120.2391109,16z / data =! 4m9! 4m8! 1m0! 1m5! 1m1! 1s0x809bd9ec83b579d1: 0xa30a54820d8f18de! 2m2! 1d-120.2346848! 2d39.197! Aby otrzymać zniżkę, skorzystaj z tego [linku do rezerwacji pokoju] (https://book.squawalpine.com/Ecomm/Package/Package/9801138/en-US/?packageid=56589&promocode=CheMarzejon) lub zadzwoń do działu rezerwacji ośrodka pod numerem [866-818-6963] (tel: 866-818-6963) i wspomnij o ślubie Che / Marzejon. Blok hotelowy jest dostępny do rezerwacji do 4 sierpnia 2021 roku.

Squaw Valley ma ograniczoną liczbę dostępnych hoteli i kwater wakacyjnych (np.Airbnb i VRBO). Kwatery w Squaw Valley obejmują również:

* [Ośrodek w Squaw Creek] (https: //www.destinationhotels. Com / squawcreek? Src = agn \ _sabre \ _ prop_seo_rnodh_gmb)
* [Red Wolf Lodge at Squaw] (https://www.redwolfsquaw.com/)
* [PlumpJack Squaw Valley Inn] (https: // plumpjacksquawvalleyinn.com/)

Alternatywy dla Squaw Valley w Tahoe obejmują:

* Tahoe City, najbliższe miasto położone nad jeziorem Tahoe (dojazd do Squaw Valley ~ 12 min samochodem)
* Kings Beach znajduje się również nad jeziorem Tahoe (dojazd do Squaw Valley ~ 30 min samochodem)
* Truckee (przejazd do Squaw Valley ~ 18 minut samochodem)
* Donner Lake Village (przejazd do Squaw Valley ~ 30 min samochodem)
